model=Sequential()
model.add(Dense(30,activation="relu"))
model.add(Dropout(0.3))
model.add(Dense(50,activation="linear"))
model.add(BatchNormalization())
model.add(Dense(40,activation="relu"))
model.add(Dense(1,activation="linear"))
